data.text: I went looking for adventure ğŸ—ºï¸, but instead.. ..found my next calling in the most unexpected place... A few months ago while travelling through the pristine badlands of Madhya Pradesh, I discovered the lightest, most delicious curd-churned ghee I'd ever tastedğŸ¤Œ I could not be more surprised with its subtle sweetness. I found two secrets behind this extraordinary ghee : Â· First, it is made from the milk of the A2 Hariana cows ğŸ„, which graze on the grass nourished by the mineral-rich waters of the Chambal River. This imparts a natural sweetness to the ghee. Â· Second, cold-processed and handcrafted using the traditional bilona method preserves the ghee's nutritional content.ğŸ§‘ğŸ³ Imagine starting your child's day with millets from Maharashtra, topped with a dollop of Bilona ghee made from the A2 milk of the Gir cow from the foothills of Mount Girnar in Gujaratâ›°ï¸, followed with lunch flavoured by yellow mustard oil from villages in Uttar Pradesh, and end the day with cookies baked in coconut oil from Perumanna village in Kerala.ğŸ¥¥ They say, it takes a village to raise a child. This sparked an idea: What if everyone could access these hand-crafted, natural luxuries from every Indian village, from the comfort of their homes? This is why we started Village Company. ğŸ’š The two pillars which form the base of our company are: First, Unmatched product quality, guaranteed by our 100% Delight Promise.
